entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -28.0°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
